Articles.Content: Besides snacks and building bigger space craft, what else do Kerbals spend their FUNds on ??
Life insurance. For some reason it is the planet with the steepest policy costs of the entire multiverse.

Let me remind you of what this subforum is for:

Forum: The Space Lounge

Off-duty chatter on any topic except KSP

Let me remind you

You must be in the wrong thread! This is about having some fun, while you are looking for the pedantic section
Any KSP stuff belongs to the General section, including fun stuff. Space Lounge is for other stuff.

They spend it on holidays on the beach, photosynthesising energy reserves for their long space journeys without food, air and water.

Any KSP stuff belongs to the General section, including fun stuff. Space Lounge is for other stuff.

I am pretty sure this is not the nagging about where stuff goes section, so can we get on with it?
Funds is short for Sunday Funday. They used to only buy Sunday fundays by trading. They made a currency backed up by Sunday Fundays and so they shortened it to Funds.
Sports cars, motorcycles, roller coaster rides, bungee jumping, large centrifuges. Anything that delivers the Gs. On a somewhat related note, medical supplies.
RPGs. the weapon kind. only kerbals spell it BPK (Bosster Probelled Kerbals
Giant fireworks with the explosive part replaced with a seat and (sometimes) a parachute.
